Misinformation and misapprehension surro: S. Congressional votes related to voting rights and immigration in March 2019.
The claim that House Democrats voted in: citizens to vote was widely shared on Facebook, with variations in the message and memes specifying the number of Democrats who allegedly voted in favor.
Right: leaning websites published articles reporting that Democrats in the U.S. House of Representatives had voted in favor of illegal immigrant voting.
The House bill known as H: R. 1, which Democrats voted in favor of, did not legally allow non-citizens to vote in the United States. The bill aimed to prevent foreign interference, reform campaign finance, and enhance voting rights protection.
